properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 18 at 4:15AM EST until February 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect south winds 15 to 20 knots veering to the
southwest late in the morning, then becoming west 20 to 25 knots
with gusts to 30 knots in the afternoon. Waves 3 to 5 feet.
Waves occasionally around 7 feet.

* WHERE...Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to
Inner Saginaw Bay.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 12 PM EST Tuesday
with the largest waves expected around 2 PM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
